column1: 1594245381524967424,1594245381524967424#RealKnowledge_Of_Gita  In Gita Adhyay 4 Shlok number 31, the giver of the knowledge of Gita says that those who do not do any kind of spiritual practice are neither happy in this world nor happy among people, that means they have no abode. @SaintRampalJiM #GodMorningSunday https://t.co/8dasZRyohF t_end
